Barber Cam - Project Status

Barber Cam is a citizen-led accountability initiative focused on ethical documentation, due process, and dignity.

## Current Phase: Validation and Framework Development --- ## Overview This project combines precision tools with principled governance to preserve accurate records and reduce harm through responsible recording practices. --- ## Features in Development ### Core Documentation Features - **Secure Recording** ‚Äî End-to-end encrypted capture with tamper-evident timestamps - **Local Server Architecture** ‚Äî Run entirely on your machine; your data stays with you - **Due Process Workflows** ‚Äî Built-in governance for ethical evidence handling - **Privacy-First Design** ‚Äî No tracking, no analytics harvesting, no third-party data sharing ### Accountability Features - **Contemporaneous Documentation** ‚Äî Real-time timestamping for accurate records - **Chain of Custody** ‚Äî Verifiable handling procedures for all recordings - **Transparent Audit Trail** ‚Äî Every action documented and traceable - **Ethical Review Framework** ‚Äî Built-in checks before any disclosure ### Safety & Compliance - **De-escalation Priority** ‚Äî Safety features that prioritize harm reduction - **Consent Management** ‚Äî Tools for complying with recording laws - **Data Minimization** ‚Äî Collect and retain as little as possible - **Secure Deletion** ‚Äî Verified removal when retention is no longer necessary --- ## Development Timeline | Phase | Status | Description | | ------- | -------------- | --------------------------------------------------------- | | Phase 1 | ‚úÖ Complete | Core principles and governance framework established | | Phase 2 | ‚úÖ Complete | System design and security protocols defined | | Phase 3 | üîÑ In Progress | Building core functionality with local server integration | | Phase 4 | ‚è≥ Pending | Security audit and ethical review | | Phase 5 | ‚è≥ Pending | Public beta release with full documentation | --- ## Governance Milestones ### Completed - ‚úÖ Foundational governance principles documented - ‚úÖ Ethical use standards established - ‚úÖ Privacy-first architecture designed - ‚úÖ Prohibited use cases defined - ‚úÖ Due process requirements specified ### In Progress - üîÑ Core safeguards implementation - üîÑ Local server development - üîÑ User interface for consent management ### Pending - ‚è≥ Independent security audit - ‚è≥ Ethics advisory review - ‚è≥ Beta testing program - ‚è≥ Public documentation release --- ## Release Criteria Public release will occur **only after** all of the following are complete: | Requirement | Status | Description | | --------------------- | -------------- | ---------------------------------------------- | | Core Safeguards | ‚úÖ Designed | Technical protections for privacy and security | | Governance Policies | ‚úÖ Documented | Clear rules for ethical operation | | Ethical Use Standards | ‚úÖ Established | Prohibited uses and accountability measures | | Security Audit | ‚è≥ Pending | Independent review of security architecture | | Privacy Verification | ‚è≥ Pending | Confirmation of data protection measures | | Beta Testing | ‚è≥ Pending | Real-world validation with limited users | --- ## Transparency Commitments This project maintains transparency through: - **Public documentation** of all governance decisions - **Open development status** updates - **Clear communication** about capabilities and limitations - **Honest acknowledgment** of what we don't know yet --- ## What This Status Page Is - A **transparent update** on development progress - A **public record** of governance milestones - An **accountability tool** for the project itself ## What This Status Page Is NOT - A release schedule or guarantee - Operational software documentation - A substitute for official announcements --- ## Contact For inquiries about Barber Cam development status: - **Email:** [BarberCamX@ProtonMail.com](mailto:BarberCamX@ProtonMail.com) - **GitHub:** Open an issue with "Status Inquiry" in the title ---
